name: Ticket to Work Program
description: Career development for Social Security disability beneficiaries ages 18 to 64 years who would like to work.
fullDescription: Career development for Social Security disability beneficiaries ages 18 to 64 years who would like to work.
whatTheyOffer: Administers Social Security, as well as disability insurance, and other benefits.
howToGetIt:
Eligibility requirements:
- The applicant is between 18-64 years
- The applicant is a US citizen or an eligible non-citizen
- The applicant has a disability or impairment
- The applicant is unable to work for a year or more because of a disability

Visit the official website or call for more information.
